items.name: Encryption at Rest
items.description: All data encrypted using AES-256 encryption in our databases and file storage systems

items.name: Encryption in Transit
items.description: TLS 1.3 for all data transmission. Perfect forward secrecy enabled for all connections

items.name: Key Management
items.description: AWS KMS for encryption key management with automatic key rotation every 90 days

items.name: Single Sign-On (SSO)
items.description: Support for SAML 2.0 SSO with Okta, Azure AD, Google Workspace, and other identity providers

items.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
items.description: MFA required for all users. Support for authenticator apps, SMS, and hardware tokens

items.name: Role-Based Access Control
items.description: Granular permissions with predefined roles and custom role creation for enterprise plans

items.name: 24/7 Security Operations
items.description: Continuous monitoring for suspicious activity, intrusion attempts, and anomalies

items.name: Automated Threat Detection
items.description: Real-time analysis of logs and events using ML-based anomaly detection

items.name: Incident Response
items.description: Dedicated security incident response team with <15 minute response time for critical issues

items.name: Cloud Infrastructure
items.description: Hosted on AWS with multi-region redundancy for high availability and disaster recovery

items.name: Network Security
items.description: VPC isolation, security groups, and web application firewall (WAF) protection

items.name: DDoS Protection
items.description: Cloudflare Enterprise with automatic DDoS mitigation up to 100 Tbps

items.name: Penetration Testing
items.description: Quarterly penetration tests by independent third-party security firms

items.name: Automated Backups
items.description: Continuous backups with 35-day retention. Point-in-time recovery available

items.name: Geographic Redundancy
items.description: Data replicated across three AWS regions (US-East, US-West, EU-West)

items.name: Disaster Recovery
items.description: RTO: 4 hours, RPO: 1 hour. Quarterly DR drills to validate recovery procedures

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy & Compliance
dataPrivacy.description: We take your privacy seriously and comply with major data protection regulations worldwide.

practices.title: Data Collection
practices.content: We collect only the data necessary to provide and improve our services. Details in our Privacy Policy.

practices.title: Data Usage
practices.content: Your data is used exclusively for service delivery. We never sell or share data with third parties for marketing.

practices.title: Data Retention
practices.content: Active customer data retained for service duration + 90 days. Deleted customers: data purged within 30 days.

practices.title: Data Deletion
practices.content: Self-service data deletion available. Contact support for complete account and data removal.

practices.title: Data Portability
practices.content: Export your data anytime in standard formats (JSON, CSV). Available via dashboard or API.

practices.title: User Rights
practices.content: GDPR and CCPA rights supported: access, correction, deletion, portability, and objection to processing.
